TopicTitle: A counter weight mod that works with .24.2

Articles.Content: Title says it all, trying to balance my space plane and I don't want to be using fuel tanks or the such.
I asked in the NRAP thread for a radial/inline part. Hopefully stupid_chris has some time to do that at some point...

I asked in the NRAP thread for a radial/inline part. Hopefully stupid_chris has some time to do that at some point...

And I said I can't. I'm not a modeler.

Someone modeled an inline one, but I'm going to have to contact the original author before adding it.

I ended up using the B9 (might be stock donno lol) lights as counter weights. went in made copies of the small ones, added weight values of a bunch of radial things and put them in (broke the light generating bit). If i could figure out how to put a scale in i would do that.

the Radial parachutes make a good counter balance lol.

And I said I can't. I'm not a modeler.

With respect, I didn't see that. But I also didn't mean to imply that either, I knew you were just maintaining it.

I have a link with counter weights but I can't paste it. I think because of the words Kerbal Space or something

Edited September 8, 2014 by rowns

I have a link with counter weights but I can't paste it. I think because of the words Kerbal Space or something

It's because it's from that site that made a license-violating mirror of the old Spaceport.
